rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
用于心力衰竭筛查的人工智能工具显示出长期的成本节省早期的研究表明，使用人工智能心电图工具的初级保健临床医生比没有人工智能的情况下发现了更多心泵无力（也称为低射血分数）的未知病例。 《梅奥诊所会议录：数字健康》上发表的新研究结果表明，从长远来看，这种类型的筛查也具有成本效益，尤其是在门诊环境中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/AI-tool-for-heart-failure-screening-demonstrates-long-term-cost- savings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/AI-tool-for-heart-failure-screening-demonstrates-long-term-cost- savings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3672785-e32c-47f4-8edf-5d556b612315 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 09:15:15 -0500 AI tool for heart failure screening demonstrates long-term cost savings
肝脏对果糖的转化通过为肿瘤增殖提供脂质来促进癌症生长这项研究强调了果糖在癌症中的间接作用，揭示了肝脏代谢如何通过脂质介导的机制促进肿瘤生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Liver-conversion-of-fructose-fuels-cancer-growth-by-supplying-lipids-for-tumor-proliferation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Liver-conversion-of-fructose-fuels-cancer-growth-by-supplying-lipids-for-tumor-proliferation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d252b09b-8e0a-4c0b-8b48-7c62d70696ea Thu, 05 Dec 2024 09:03:00 -0500 Liver conversion of fructose fuels cancer growth by supplying lipids for tumor proliferation
短暂的活动对女性心脏健康有益研究表明，每天 3.4 分钟的 VILPA 可使主要不良心血管事件减少 45%，凸显了益处方面的性别差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Brief-bursts-of-activity-linked-to-heart-health-benefits-for-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Brief-bursts-of-activity-linked-to-heart-health-benefits-for-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f79274d-4d95-45c3-b562-0b0ecdfe0e5b Thu, 05 Dec 2024 08:40:00 -0500 Brief bursts of activity linked to heart health benefits for women
用蛋白质和脂肪替代碳水化合物可改善 2 型糖尿病患者的胆固醇状况研究表明，减少碳水化合物、高蛋白饮食可以改善 2 型糖尿病患者的脂质代谢并减少肝脏脂肪，而不会减轻体重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Replacing-碳水化合物-with- Protein-and-fat-improves-cholesterol-profiles-in-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Replacing-碳水化合物-with- Protein-and-fat-improves-cholesterol-profiles-in-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e6848a8-464b-452a-b145-c6b49b3c848c Thu, 05 Dec 2024 08:38:00 -0500 Replacing carbohydrates with protein and fat improves cholesterol profiles in type 2 diabetes
基孔肯雅热对健康和经济的影响可能被低估这项研究评估了基孔肯雅热对健康和经济的影响，揭示了卫生系统的巨大负担以及约 499 亿美元的全球成本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Chikungunyas-health-and-economic-impact-likely-underestimated.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Chikungunyas-health-and-economic-impact-likely-underestimated.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=801eab3d-4c6a-48a9-ad55-21803dd2e46a Thu, 05 Dec 2024 08:11:00 -0500 Chikungunya's health and economic impact likely underestimated
国家试验调查多囊卵巢综合症女性恢复排卵的装置俄克拉荷马城俄克拉荷马健康科学大学的医生正在领导一项全国临床试验，以帮助患有多囊卵巢综合症 (PCOS) 相关不孕症且想要怀孕的女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/National-trial-investigates-device-to-restore-ovulation-in-women-with-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/National-trial-investigates-device-to-restore-ovulation-in-women-with-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7fec58b-6abd-4a01-ae44-b63774e9138b Thu, 05 Dec 2024 08:03:21 -0500 National trial investigates device to restore ovulation in women with PCOS
珊瑚骨移植可以改变骨缺损的治疗斯旺西大学的研究人员开发了一种革命性的骨移植替代品，其灵感来自于珊瑚，它不仅能促进更快的愈合，而且在修复完成后会在体内自然溶解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Coral-inspired-bone-graft-could-transform-treatment-for-bone-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Coral-inspired-bone-graft-could-transform-treatment-for-bone-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c9285ee-0baf-41c7-8b8f-fd545fb5817d Thu, 05 Dec 2024 06:27:46 -0500 Coral-inspired bone graft could transform treatment for bone defects
一条胳膊和一条腿：慈善护理斗争中的新教训联邦法律要求所有非营利医院都有财务援助政策（也称为“慈善医疗”），以减少或免除人们的医疗费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-New-lessons-in-the-fight-for-charity-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-New-lessons-in-the-fight-for-charity-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98277a8f-6403-46f4-85ca-8201e60e4f3a Thu, 05 Dec 2024 05:51:58 -0500 An Arm and a Leg: New lessons in the fight for charity care
潜在的医疗补助削减将如何在加州发挥作用2017年，控制国会的共和党人大力削减联邦医疗补助支出，这是政府资助的覆盖低收入家庭和个人的医疗计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/How-potial-Medicaid-cuts-could-play-out-in-California.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/How-potial-Medicaid-cuts-could-play-out-in-California.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45a486d1-ee73-4d80-ac44-2885767dba96 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 05:47:01 -0500 How potential Medicaid cuts could play out in California
世卫组织授予结核病分子诊断检测资格预审资格世界卫生组织 (WHO) 已授予名为 Xpert® MTB/RIF Ultra 的结核病 (TB) 分子诊断测试资格预审。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/WHO-grants-prequalification-to-molecular-diagnostic-test-for-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/WHO-grants-prequalification-to-molecular-diagnostic-test-for-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=510f5ad8-1a49-4a37-8da1-4e85ed28d845 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 05:44:11 -0500 WHO grants prequalification to molecular diagnostic test for tuberculosis
